problem.markdown:
1. A system with 10kg mass 10N/m stiffness and 2.5Ns/m damping is being operated at 1rad/s if Xst=1cm what is the value of X0 ?
(x) 4cm () 1cm () 2cm () none of these
2. At resonance, for underdamped system increasing the value of damping would lead to ?
() increase then decrease in steady state amplitude (x) decrease in steady state amplitude () decrease then increase in steady state amplitude () increase in steady state amplitude
3. What is the phase difference between input and response for a system with 10kg mass 10N/m stiffness and 15Ns/m damping being operated at 0.5 rad/s
() 60 degrees (x) 45 degrees () 90 degrees () 30 degrees
4. Phase difference between input and response at resonance is 90o
(x) true () false 5. Amplification factor of a system was found to be 2 at resonance. What would be its damping ratio?
(x) 0.25 () 0.125 () 0.5 () 1
